author: profd2004
title: Translation for Proposal API DATA
description: We're building an API to easy query and audit all of catalyst proposal data and metrics that will only be available in English.
solution: Add a step to the current proposal api to translate data using machine learning. Set aside a fund to incentivize human validators.
experience: 14+ Yrs Software & Cloud Engineering, Blockchain development, business consulting, world languages, technical writing, teaching.
